title: League can you spot me 1 RP please
body: bought rp and am missing 1 more to get the last thing i want and im poor help me out bro..

replies.body: Hmm, I think we can work something out.  No guarantees but hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or twitter.  We'll see what we can do!

write a ticket to the riot games support. they can give you a small amount of rp (1rp is DEFINETLY a small amount) for a self made drawing. dont worry it doesnt have to be good just put some love into it. beware though this only works one time.
